page.title: 15...EDUCATION
page.content: There are schools in the area offering education for children from the age of 3,but this is restricted to Timberley, in Bradley Rd.,where the total roll is 400,Heathlands,Ashville Rd.,334 pupils and St. Wilfrid's R.C. Shawsdale Rd. which has 254 and is the only church school. Other primary schools are Hillstone,Hillstone Rd.,200 pupils,Tame Valley,Chillingholme Rd.,240,Brownmead, Pencroft Rd.,240 and Hodge Hill J.I., Stechford Rd.,290. Separate junior schools include Bromford,in Bromford Rd with 300,Firs,in Dreghorn Rd.,119 and Castle Bromwich,Hurst Lane North with 454.Infant schools at Firs and Bromford have 143 and 200 respectively.There are 2 schools for those with special needs, The Pines,Dreghorn Rd.,and Beaufort, Coleshill Rd. 1390 attend Hodge Hill Sec.Bromford Rd.and 430 pupils go to Alderlea Boys Sec.in Alderpits Rd..
